setup_instructions.step_2: Generate SIP domain and request password from SignalWire support
setup_instructions.step_4: Save credential ID in 'sip_trunk_credential_id' field above
setup_instructions.step_5: Run phone number registration command for each number
setup_instructions.step_6: Save each phone number ID in 'vapi_phone_number_id' field above
setup_instructions.step_7: Update n8n workflow to use phone number IDs

pool_management.description: Dynamic phone number pool with assignment and release logic
pool_management.current_behavior: Numbers assigned to broker companies, rotated using least-recently-used
assignment_logic: Numbers belong to broker companies, not individual brokers
All leads for a broker use that company's pool
Numbers held 18 hours by default, extended if appointment booked
release_logic: Booked appointment: Hold until 24 hours after appointment
No booking: Release same day (18 hours)
No answer: Retry same day, then release
planned_enhancements: Automatic scaling to 15 numbers per broker in production
